comments.raw_text:
Taras has found that mimetype look ups are expensive, we already have a mechanism to cache them, so let's use it.

Here's a WIP patch. It looks like it should be doing the right thing, but I don't see mimetypes.rdf being created
comments.creator: lassey@chromium.org
comments.text:
Created attachment 511061
WIP patch

Taras has found that mimetype look ups are expensive, we already have a mechanism to cache them, so let's use it.

Here's a WIP patch. It looks like it should be doing the right thing, but I don't see mimetypes.rdf being created
comments.author: lassey@chromium.org

comments.text: Doing this will mean we miss changes to the OS settings, no?

comments.raw_text:
(In reply to comment #1)
> Doing this will mean we miss changes to the OS settings, no?

As I understand it, doing this means we do what other OSs do. I have no idea how this cache is flushed
